sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
 CONCAT(CASE WHEN x.Error_Count > 0 OR (x.Error_Count = 0 AND x.Asset_Id IS NULL) THEN 'FAILED LOAD : ' ELSE 'SUCCESSFUL LOAD : ' END, x.Work_Sheet, ' - ', x.Work_Book) AS Message_Header,
 ass.Ops_Representative_Email, ass.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ass.Ops_Representative_First_Name, x.Error_Table,
 CASE WHEN x.Error_Count > 0 THEN CAST(x.Error_Count AS VARCHAR) WHEN x.Error_Count = 0 AND x.Asset_Id IS NULL THEN 'UNKNOWN' ELSE '0' END AS Error_Count 
FROM (
SELECT err.Error_Table, err.Work_Book, err.Work_Sheet, err.Error_Count, wb.Asset_Id, wb.Fund_Id
FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
RIGHT JOIN (
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Certification_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Certifications' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Timber Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Answers_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Answers_DWH_Export' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Contract_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Contracts' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Harvest Reconcilliation' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Incident_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Major Severe Incidents' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Operation_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Operations' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Other Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Related Party Transactions' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Risk Opportunity Register' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
UNION
SELECT 'audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error' AS Error_Table, 'Strategic Projects' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count
FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
) err
ON wb.Work_Book = err.Work_Book and wb.Work_Sheet = err.Work_Sheet
)x
JOIN relational.Asset ass
ON 1=1
WHERE ass.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' AND ass.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}' AND ass.record_deleted_flag = 0;
